flavorText:
"The Roil is destructive, but not random. It's Zendikar's way of revealing secrets."
—Ilori, merfolk falconer

foreignData.flavorText: „Die Turbulenz ist zerstörerisch, aber nicht zufällig. Auf diese Weise deckt Zendikar seine Geheimnisse auf." —Ilori, Meermann-Falkner
foreignData.name: Geheimnisse der Tiefe
foreignData.text:
Ziehe zwei Karten.
Landung — Falls ein Land unter deiner Kontrolle in diesem Zug ins Spiel gekommen ist, ziehe stattdessen drei Karten.

foreignData.flavorText: "La Turbulencia es destructiva, pero no aleatoria. Es la manera de Zendikar de revelar secretos." —Ilori, halconera tritón
foreignData.name: Misterios de las profundidades
foreignData.text:
Roba dos cartas.
Aterrizaje — Si una tierra entró al campo de batalla bajo tu control este turno, en vez de eso, roba tres cartas.

foreignData.flavorText: « Le Roulis est destructeur, mais pas aléatoire. C'est la manière dont Zendikar révèle ses secrets. » —Ilori, fauconnière ondine
foreignData.name: Mystères des profondeurs
foreignData.text:
Piochez deux cartes.
Toucheterre — Si vous avez fait arriver un terrain sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle ce tour-ci, piochez trois cartes à la place.

foreignData.flavorText: "Il Torbido è distruttivo, ma non casuale. È il modo in cui Zendikar rivela i suoi segreti." —Ilori, tritona falconiera
foreignData.name: Misteri degli Abissi
foreignData.text:
Pesca due carte.
Terraferma — Se hai fatto entrare nel campo di battaglia una terra sotto il tuo controllo in questo turno, pesca invece tre carte.

foreignData.flavorText: 「乱動は破壊的だが、でたらめではない。 ゼンディカーなりの秘密の明かし方なんだ。」 ――マーフォークの鷹匠、イローリ
foreignData.name: 深遠の謎
foreignData.text:
カードを２枚引く。
上陸 ― このターン、あなたのコントロール下で土地が戦場に出ている場合、代わりにカードを３枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText: "O Turbilhão é destruidor, mas não aleatório. É o modo de Zendikar revelar segredos." — Ilori, falcoeira tritão
foreignData.name: Mistérios das Profundezas
foreignData.text:
Compre dois cards.
Aterragem — Se você teve um terreno que entrou no campo de batalha sob o seu controle neste turno, em vez disso, compre três cards.

foreignData.flavorText: «Великий Вал несет страшные, но отнюдь не случайные разрушения. Так Зендикар раскрывает свои тайны». — Илори, мерфолкская сокольничая
foreignData.name: Тайны Морской Пучины
foreignData.text:
Возьмите две карты.
Землепад — Если земля вышла на поле битвы под вашим контролем в этом ходу, возьмите три карты вместо этого.

foreignData.flavorText: 「狂搅的破坏力并非随机发挥。 这是赞迪卡揭晓秘密的方式。」 ～人鱼驯隼师依露黎
foreignData.name: 深海谜团
foreignData.text:
抓两张牌。
地落～如果本回合中有地在你的操控下进战场，则改为抓三张牌。

name: Mysteries of the Deep
originalText:
Draw two cards.
Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, draw three cards instead.

rulings.text: Whether you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn is checked as this spell resolves, not as you cast it.
Having more than one land enter the battlefield under your control this turn provides no additional benefit.

The landfall ability checks for an action that has happened in the past. It doesn’t matter if a land that entered the battlefield under your control previously in the turn is still on the battlefield, is still under your control, or is still a land.
Once the spell resolves, having a land enter the battlefield under your control provides no further benefit.
The effect of this spell’s landfall ability replaces its normal effect. If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, only the landfall-based effect happens.

text:
Draw two cards.
Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, draw three cards instead.
